name: add_book
attributes: # [doc = " 本の追加：PDA でアカウント作成し、タイトル・著者・貸出状況・最終貸出者をまとめて初期化"]
body: * ctx . accounts . book = Book { owner : ctx . accounts . librarian . key () , bump , book_id , title , author , available : true , last_reader : ctx . accounts . librarian . key () , } ;

name: check_out
attributes: # [doc = " 本の貸出：available を false にし、last_reader を申請者に更新"]
body: let book = & mut ctx . accounts . book ;
book . last_reader = ctx . accounts . user . key () ;

name: check_in
attributes: # [doc = " 本の返却：available を true に戻す"]

fields.name: book
fields.attribute: # [doc = " PDA で生成する Book アカウント"] # [account (init , payer = librarian , space = 8 + 32 + 1 + 8 + 4 + 100 + 4 + 100 + 1 + 32 , seeds = [b"book" , librarian . key () . as_ref () , & book_id . to_le_bytes ()] , bump)]

fields.name: librarian
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 図書館管理者（署名必須）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: book
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 既存の Book（PDA＋bump 検証のみ、誰でも貸出・返却可能）"] # [account (mut , seeds = [b"book" , book . owner . as_ref () , & book . book_id . to_le_bytes ()] , bump = book . bump ,)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 処理を実行するユーザー（署名必須）"] # [account (signer)]
